data.title: Emma Forbes, First Edition
data.meta_description: Entertaining with Nanette Newman and Her Daughters Sarah and Emma by Newman, Nanette; Forbes, Sarah; Forbes, Emma and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.co.uk.
data.text:
Laminate Board. Condition: Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Good. First. A GOOD COPY OF THIS COOK BOOK IT SEEMS THAT THAT THE LAST 6/7 PAGES MAY HAVE BEEN DAMP OTHERWISE V G CONDITION BOOK AND D/W FIRST EDITION Size: 4to - over 9Â¾" - 12" tall. Book.

Large Laminated Card Cover. Condition: Very Good. First. An excellent copy of this fabulous cookery book. No creases to the spine or covers. ---- Nanette Newman and her daughters have got together to produce this imaginative and stylish book. Over 140 recipes. Full colour illustrations of the trios favourite foods along with their easy to follow recipes. Wipe clean covers. Book.

Soft cover. Condition: As New. No Jacket. 1st Edition. Published In 1996 : 1st. Edition : Harper Collins Publishing : Large Format : Very Small Top Corner Creases Due To Top Corner Thumbing : Just A Very Small Amount Of Faint Face Rubbing : Otherwise , As New Throughout : Still Reasonably Crisp & Tight , With No Inscriptions : Good Solid Binding With Bright Clear Text & Photographs : Overall, A Very Nice Book :

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. First Edition. Hardback. 4to. pp. 100. Illustrated throughout, chiefly in colour. Original blue boards lettered white on spine and upper cover. A photographic record of the 50th birthday celebrations of banker Graham Clempson who with his wife, TV presenter Emma Forbes, daughter of actress Nanette Newman and director Bryan Forbes hosted a long weekend in the South of France for family and friends that included a poolside barbeque on arrival, a visit to the Monaco Boat Show, a birthday dinner, yoga and spa treatments and supper at La Chaumiere. A fine copy. Fine.
